basics.name: Mohammed Safee Uddin
basics.label: Analyst
basics.summary: Safee hails from Hyderabad. He has earned Certification in Data Science from the International Institute of Information Technology-Bangalore. Before starting at MAA Serona, he worked for Fortis Healthcare Ltd. as Operations Manager. His work was to act as a liasion between the clinical staff and the recepients of healthcare services, mostly implementing policies and managing medical and non-medical staff. His non-work interests range widely, from learning trends and changes in how healthcare is administered, improvement in patient access, improved revenues for health systems, lower costs, and much more.

work.summary: Jocata Financial Advisory and Technology thrives to create a digital ecosystem of technologies that deliver adaptive solutions for financial institutions at high velocity and scale, driving business growth, streamlined operations, risk-adjusted insights and regulatory compliance.
highlights: Facilitate in development and delivery of projects through effective communication of requirements, changes and testing results.
Build shared understanding of problems, outline the parameters of the project, and determine potential solutions
Intermediary between clients, developers, users, management, and information technology (IT).

work.summary: QBIKO IT Solutions (previously as MAA SERONA aka MAA infotek) is a software services company focused on helping drive value through IT investments by bringing the depth of domain knowledge, technology expertise and client commitment to deliver strategically new IT & healthcare solutions.
highlights: Developing technical solutions to healthcare problems, begins with defining, analyzing and documenting requirements. Managing requirements at the project level to fulfill cient needs.
Design and review test cases, process change requests, and manage a projectâ€™s scope, acceptance, installation and deployment.
Prioritize requirements and create conceptual prototypes and mock-ups.

work.summary: Fortis La Femme is India's leading healthcare provider for all stages of a woman's lifespan. Fortis La Femme is known for giving distinctive care through the range of services like Out patient, Emergency Services 24*7, Pharmacy, Preventive health check, Radiology, Blood storage bank, Medical ICU, Tertiary level 3 NICU and PICU.
highlights: Implementing strategic operations and quality policies ensuring patients' safety.
Managing medical & non-medical staff and monitor daily operations of the facility.
Collect and analyze data to recognise trends and predict future logistical needs.

work.summary: Global Hospitals, was the first Gleneagles Global Hospitals facility opened in Hyderabad. The facility has been the forefront of several medical advances in the field of multi-organ transplants. It is known as one of the best tertiary care multi-super specialty hospitals in India.
highlights: Help diagnosing and treating disease conditions by providing support to physicians.
Coordinating with physicians and other healthcare professionals for creating and evaluating customized care plans.
Maintain inventory of ordered medical supplies, direction and supervision of nurse aides and home health aides.

work.summary: Princess Esra Hospital, managed by Owaisi Hospital & Research Centre attached with the Deccan College of Medical Sciences, provide effective and advance health care of the high equality to all segments of society, irrespective of their economic status.
highlights: Assessing, observing and recording patient vital signs
Assisting physicians in performing procedures, administering intravenous fluids and medications
Ensuring proper functioning of ventilators, monitors and other medical equipment. Responding to life-saving situations, using nursing standards and protocols for treatment

education.institution: Dr. N.T.R University of Health Sciences
